welcome_message_body: Welcome to Compton! Get ready to experience the unique charm of this vibrant city, known for its rich cultural history and lively community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Compton has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Compton Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Compton Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrance Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Torrance Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whiteman Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Whiteman Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Monica Airport offers a variety of services for travelers, including check-in, baggage claim, and rental car facilities.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Santa Monica Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for travelers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password. Ask airport staff for more information.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bob Hope Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bob Hope Airport, primarily serving regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Ynez Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Santa Ynez Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves primarily domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Van Nuys Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Van Nuys Airport caters to the needs of private jet owners and their guests.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.
